name: Mixing Colors
description:
Created by Duova#1990 and Kibou#3129 for Mini Jam: Colors.

A game where you keep colored balls in the air using the same colored paddles.

The theme of this game jam was Colors, and the Limitation was You are Your Own Enemy

Thank you for playing our Game!

Controls are:

E/R to move green paddle left and right

J/K to move blue paddle left and right

N/. to move red paddle left and right
